title: [An apologie of the Earle of Essex]
author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1566-1601.
notes: Includes "La. Rich to Her Maiestie in the behalfe of the Earle of Essex."
Imperfect: t.p. lacking; tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
